column4: hey, if I get 11.10, when 12.04 comes is upgrading a simple matter of doing "sudo apt-get update && apt-get upgrade"?

what's the likelihood of it being a really seamless transition that doesn't break anything? this is on a server machine that's pretty slim and has just an instance of wordpress being served with apache and that's it
try asking in #ubuntu+1 - more people there have tried
